_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY DARKMATTER SERVERS - ANTIMATTERZONE.NET
name: DMS FiveM Server
author: captainpax@antimatterzone.net
description: Standalone FiveM FXServer (DMS Edition) - Full auto-install, auto-update, and production-ready with ESX Legacy compatibility. Built by Darkmatter Servers (AntimatterZone).

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

set -euo pipefail

# Prepare container folders
mkdir -p /home/container /home/container/resources /home/container/opt/cfx-server /home/container/logs /home/container/cache
cd /home/container

# Download latest DMS stack files
echo "[*] Downloading latest Darkmatter stack..."
curl -fsSL https://cloud.antimatterzone.net/s/9DzxCAFpSNMok6E/download/entrypoint.sh -o entrypoint.sh
curl -fsSL https://cloud.antimatterzone.net/s/FpWTPSHS5C2YBpM/download/install.sh -o install.sh
curl -fsSL https://cloud.antimatterzone.net/s/5ikTrqTCSdSoPjq/download/server.cfg -o server.cfg

# Validate downloads
if [ ! -f entrypoint.sh ] || [ ! -f install.sh ] || [ ! -f server.cfg ]; then
    echo "[!] Download failed. Aborting installation."
    exit 1
fi

chmod +x entrypoint.sh install.sh

# Run the install script
bash ./install.sh

# Cleanup if needed
rm -f /home/container/*.tmp || true

echo "[âœ”] Darkmatter DMS FiveM installation completed successfully."

variables.description: Choose FXServer build to install (recommended, latest, or specific build ID)

variables.description: Displayed server project name for players
